entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
